attributes.action: bring back smoking rooms in pub's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Well like the old days when rooms were sepperated i am doing this petition to bring a single heated smokeing room to pubs in concideration of all customers old and new  how meany customers want to have a smoke in a cold back garden?

rejection.details:
There are already several alrready in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Smokingrooms1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
